name: Unleash Troodons
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You summon two troodons, plus two for every tier above 1 this spell was cast at, to empty spaces within range that you can see. They take their turn after yours and obey your mental orders.

Creatures summoned by this spell count as beasts in addition to their normal typing. They are treated as reanimated creatures.

Casting this spell again causes any remaining troodons to vanish.
empower: No longer causes prior troodons to vanish.
